price: Eğer dileseydik her bir beldeye elbette bir uyarıcı gönderirdik.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
